name: dirt
description: It's dirt.  Looks like some fine soil for tillage.  Could also be dug out for construction projects.

name: stone bridge road
description: A section of a bridge made from stone. While people are not barred from walking on it, this section is used by wagons and carriages and as such it is advised to step out of the way in the event of one passing.

name: stone bridge sidewalk
description: A slightly raised section of a bridge made from stone for people to walk on while carriages and wagons pass by.

name: short stone wall
description: A sturdy but short stone wall. For when you want the protection of a stone wall but still want to see over it. This one is for the sides of bridges.
